languages.text: {n}Рослый мужчина, встречавший вас у входа, переминается с ноги на ногу, то и дело мрачно озираясь.{/n}
{n}The tall man who welcomed you at the entrance is shifting from foot to foot and keeps glancing around with a gloomy expression.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Рослый мужчина, встречавший вас у входа, переминается с ноги на ногу, то и дело мрачно озираясь.{/n}

languages.text: {n}在入口欢迎你的高个子男人正在不断地踱着步，表情阴沉地四处扫视着。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The tall man who welcomed you at the entrance is shifting from foot to foot and keeps glancing around with a gloomy expression.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}在入口欢迎你的高个子男人正在不断地踱着步，表情阴沉地四处扫视着。{/n}

languages.text: {n}El hombre alto que te recibió en la entrada cambia su peso de un pie al otro y no deja de mirar alrededor con expresión lúgubre.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The tall man who welcomed you at the entrance is shifting from foot to foot and keeps glancing around with a gloomy expression.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El hombre alto que te recibió en la entrada cambia su peso de un pie al otro y no deja de mirar alrededor con expresión lúgubre.{/n}

languages.text: {n}入り口で出迎えてくれた背の高い男性は落ち着きなく歩き回り、暗い表情で周囲を見渡し続けている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The tall man who welcomed you at the entrance is shifting from foot to foot and keeps glancing around with a gloomy expression.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}入り口で出迎えてくれた背の高い男性は落ち着きなく歩き回り、暗い表情で周囲を見渡し続けている。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der große Mann, der dich am Eingang begrüßt hat, tritt von einem Fuß auf den anderen und sieht sich ständig besorgt um.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The tall man who welcomed you at the entrance is shifting from foot to foot and keeps glancing around with a gloomy expression.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der große Mann, der dich am Eingang begrüßt hat, tritt von einem Fuß auf den anderen und sieht sich ständig besorgt um.{/n}

languages.text: {n}L'homme de grande taille qui vous a {mf|accueilli|accueillie} à l'entrée se balance d'une jambe sur l'autre tout en regardant autour de lui d'un air sombre.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The tall man who welcomed you at the entrance is shifting from foot to foot and keeps glancing around with a gloomy expression.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}L'homme de grande taille qui vous a {mf|accueilli|accueillie} à l'entrée se balance d'une jambe sur l'autre tout en regardant autour de lui d'un air sombre.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Girişte seni karşılayan uzun boylu adam, ağırlığını bir o bacağına bir ötekine verip kasvetli bir ifadeyle etrafa bakınıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The tall man who welcomed you at the entrance is shifting from foot to foot and keeps glancing around with a gloomy expression.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Girişte seni karşılayan uzun boylu adam, yaslandığı ayağını değiştirip kasvetli bir ifadeyle etrafa bakınıyor.{/n}
